name: DA-14 Corp.
description:
DA-14 Corp. is a reliable JavaScript development and consulting partner for dozens of businesses worldwide. Back in 2013, the company was founded by software engineers with the idea of "working in a different way" and we continue improving our service to this day. Our core principles are:
 
We build projects solely with JavaScript (Node.js, Angular, ReactJS, Vue.js, React Native)
Hire only strong specialists, who share our values and principles (over 50 in-house DA-14 employees)
Maintain transparency throughout the entire project lifecycle following  our own proven working framework 
 
Today we have solid expertise in technology consulting and software development for diverse business industries like logistics, architecture & planning, administration sector, financial services, marketing & advertising, entertainment, education, and many others. Working with a wide range of partners opens up great possibilities, as we're not solving similar problems over and over again. We're ever-enhancing our best practices and frame of reference, which helps us deal with new challenges in different ways. 
READ MORE...
